saao/saa05/P393858
a-na LUGAL EN-ia ARAD-ka {1}ša-aš-šur-du-ub-bu lu DI-mu a-na LUGAL EN-ia a-dan-niš DI-mu a-na {URU}bi-ra-a-ti a-na KUR ša LUGAL EN-ia ina UGU ṭe₃-e-me ša {LU₂}SANGA ša {URU}pe-en-za-a ša LUGAL be-li₂ iš-pur-an-ni ma-a mi-i-nu ša LUGAL {KUR}URI-a.a ina UGU-hi-šu iš-pur-an-ni u₂-ki-nu-šu-u-ni ma-a ina UGU {LU₂}pi-qi₂-ti ša {URU}ta-si x x x x x+x liš-ul x+x-si x x x x x x LUGAL EN-ia x x x x x x {LU₂}qur-bu-ti x x x x {LU₂}DUMU-šip-ra-a-ni {LU₂}DUMU-šip-ra-a-ni x x x x x ša {URU}pu-lu-u-a x x x x x-u-ni ša {KUR}al-zu-nu x x x x it-tal-ku-u-ni ina bir-ti x x x ina bir-ti ŠEŠ-MEŠ-šu₂ uk-tin-nu x x za-ki-ti {LU₂}SANGA ina UGU x x x x x x x {LU₂}qur-bu-ti x x x x x x e-ta-rab x x x x x x x x-tu₂ x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x {URU}ti-di x x x x x ina ta-hu-u₂-me ša {KUR}šu-ub-ri-a x x+x-ma-nu ul-lu-tu₂ gi-x x ša na-gi-e a-nu-su-nu x x x x-ru-tu ina {URU}pu-u-me i-za-zu {1}x-x-ra-a {LU₂}GAL-da-a.a-li {LU₂}GAL-da-a.a-li ša {1}hu-te-šu-ub LUGAL be-li₂ u₂-da x x x ša {1}ru-sa-a u₂-sa-hi-ir x x x x ip-ti-qi-su u₂-ma-a x x x x ina IGI {1}hu-te-šu-bu x x x x x-da la me-me-ni {LU₂}DUMU-šip-ri {LU₂}DUMU-šip-ri ina UGU-hi-šu₂ ina {URU}pu-u-me i-sa-bar ma-a šum₂-mu at-ta x x x kam-mu-sa-ka ma-a x x x du-ma-qi ša AD-u-a ša a-na-ku a-di-a-kan-ni sa-hi-ra {LU₂}DUMU-šip-ri {LU₂}DUMU-šip-ri ša il-li-kan-ni ma-a šul-mu a-na {1}hu-te-šub la-a ta-qa-bi ri-ik-su la ta-ma-har a-su-na-ka {LU₂}DUMU-šip-ri {LU₂}DUMU-šip-ri {1}hu-te-šu-bu ina UGU {KUR}URI-a.a TA {LU₂}DUMU-šip-ri-šu₂ {LU₂}DUMU-šip-ri-šu₂ i-sa-bar it-ta-lak ina meš-li KASKAL ik-ta-la-šu₂ ma-a a-di al-la-ku-u-ni E₂-EN-MEŠ-ka E₂-EN-MEŠ-ka a-qa-bu-u-ni ma-a šum₂-mu u₂-ra-mu-ka tal-la-ka la-šu ma la ta-sa-hur x x x x x x x+a x+x x x ši an x x x x x x x aš₂ u x x x-MEŠ UŠ₂-MEŠ x x x x x x ak-ṣur x x x ma-a x x x x x x-ni li-din
